readme: CodeMirror editor for TiddlyWiki provides a flexible and rich extension framework (including highlighting, completion, preview and other features), anyone can use this framework to write extension plug-ins for the editor! Currently based on this framework to achieve the following features.
* Wiki link auto-tip; * Tiddler preview; * TiddlyWiki5 (`text/vnd.tiddlywiki`)
More features are in development, welcome to join!

language.title: Current language used by the plugin
description: Choose the language that suits you, `system` stands for follow the system preference.
If there is no language that suits you, please ask in [[Issue|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/issues]], anyone is welcome to contribute code!

realtime-hint.title: Realtime-hint when typing
realtime-hint.description: Real-time code completion hints like VSCode while typing (currently only ~WikiLink completion is implemented) and no need to activate with <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Space</kbd>.

clickable-links.title: Clickable links
clickable-links.description: Whethere WikiLinks and URLs are clickable.

hint-preview.title: Hint preview
hint-preview.description: When auto-completion is performed, a small document/preview box pops up to the right of the completion box based on the selected suggestion entry.

blockquote.name: blockquote
blockquote.preview:
!! Multi-line block quotes

<<<
This is a block quoted paragraph
written in English
<<<
